thread.title: Passengers urged to check routes amid strike
thread.title_full: Passengers urged to check routes amid strike | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Passengers urged to check routes amid strike
text:
Cardiff Bus’s Unite union members will begin a 48-hour strike, starting on from Thursday, October 1.
It follows a recent ballot after a pay offer by the bus operator was rejected.
A limited bus service will run from 00:01 hours on Thursday 1st until 24:00 hours on Friday 2nd October.
This latest offer was to increase the pay award to 2.5% for one year and retaining the attendance bonus in its current form.
Our latest offer was to increase the pay award by 0.5% to 2.5% retaining the attendance bonus in its form but regretfully this offer was rejected.
We are extremely apologetic for again inconveniencing our customers, and we will do our best to ensure that we keep Cardiff moving during this time.
– Cynthia Ogbonna, managing director of Cardiff Bus Last updated Tue 29 Sep 2015 Travel South Wales Newport
